review_title: Nice place to start your career if you are immigrant
pros: Healthcare Benefits, schedule, Location, Salary and friendly atmosphere
cons: It's not a dream job, just good start

pros: Good pay, benefits, opportunities.  Great place to work. Staff are great.  There's always new job postings to keep things fresh and try something new
cons: Important to have your education in place.  Wish management had more interaction with staff working as a team than so separate.
